## presentation

```{r}
a <- 4
b <- 3
c <- 4

p <- c(0:10)/10

u_h <- p*b+(1-p)*(a+b+c)
u_l <- p*a+(1-p)*(c)

plot(p,u_h)
plot(p,u_l)

```
